basics.name: Mohammad Anas
basics.title: Data Scientist | Software Engineer | AI  Engineer
basics.about: An aspiring software engineer and data scientist with expertise in full-stack development, AI solutions, and data analysis.

work.name: Dubizzle Labs
work.summary: Leading frontend and backend development for an audio player application. Focused on UI enhancements and backend migrations to improve stability.
highlights: Migrated backend from Strapi V3 to V4.
Enhanced UI using Next.js.
Implemented solutions to track null-returning Elasticsearch queries.

work.name: PakWheels
work.summary: Developed backend features, conducted extensive testing, and created real-time YouTube data dashboards.
highlights: Tested applications with RSpec.
Developed dashboards using Google Looker Studio.

projects.name: PersonaPitch
projects.summary: A full-stack MERN app simulating customer interactions with a custom OpenAI GPT chatbot, featuring multi-modal interaction and dynamic personas.
highlights: Built a full-stack MERN app simulating customer interactions with a custom OpenAI GPT chatbot.
Integrated voice-to-text (Whisper) and text-to-speech (gTTS) for multi-modal customer interaction.
Created dynamic personas for simulating diverse customer moods, improving sales pitch practice.
Generated mood-specific responses for realistic, persona-driven feedback.

projects.name: EasyHiring - AI Powered HR Solution
projects.summary: AI-powered resume ranking system and customized interview question generator.
highlights: Implemented resume ranking based on relevance to the job description.
Generated customized interview questions for top-ranked candidates based on resume analysis.
Integrated a SQLite database to store and view candidates' data.

projects.name: SmartMediaMonitor
projects.summary: A comprehensive social media analysis platform with backend in FASTAPI and React frontend.
highlights: Developing a comprehensive social media analysis platform.
Gathering text data from diverse social media platforms using web scraping techniques.
Implementing FASTAPI for backend and React for a user-friendly frontend.
Fine-tuning a Large Language Model (LLM) for intelligent suggestions.

projects.name: ResNet-Optima
projects.summary: A deep learning optimization project where ResNet architecture is redesigned for better performance and lower resource consumption.
highlights: Redesigned ResNet architecture using a thinning mechanism to decrease complexity and resource use.
Incorporated adaptive pooling and controlled stochastic depth to improve robustness.
Optimized for rapid training and inference, balancing performance with low resource demands.

projects.name: BERT-Pytorch
projects.summary: Enhancing text understanding by pre-training and fine-tuning BERT for classification tasks with a custom pipeline in PyTorch.
highlights: Enhanced text understanding by pre-training and fine-tuning BERT on an Amazon dataset for classification tasks.
Developed a PyTorch training pipeline with dynamic masking and custom data loaders for efficiency.
Improved model transparency and real-world applicability through attention visualization evaluations.

projects.name: GoogleNet-Pytorch
projects.summary: Implemented the GoogleNet model for high accuracy image classification tasks using PyTorch.
highlights: Implemented GoogleNet model for image classification tasks, targeting high accuracy and efficiency.
Implemented custom PyTorch transformations and data loaders to optimize model training.
Assessed model accuracy and computational efficiency, integrating the trained model into a larger application for real-time image processing.

projects.name: VGG16-Pytorch
projects.summary: Developed a VGG16-based neural network for image classification tasks using deep learning techniques in PyTorch.
highlights: Developed a VGG16-based neural network for advanced image classification tasks.
Implemented and optimized data preprocessing and augmentation techniques to enhance model training effectiveness.
Conducted comprehensive performance evaluations, comparing model predictions against benchmarks and achieving significant accuracy improvements.
